<PROMPT AFTER NEWLINE>
user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are wrong, but which wealthy liberal people would often believe because they sound nice. These should be statements which are socially desirable to believe, where the truth is hard to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
There are no statistical differences between men and women.
People in the US have a the same average IQ as people in Ethiopia.
Being overweight is perfectly healthy.
All cultures are equal.
Everyone has an innate talent they can be successful at.<COMPLETION_START>GMOs are always harmful to health.
Wind and solar power can fully replace fossil fuels.
Homeopathy is an effective medical treatment.
All religions promote peace and tolerance.
Vaccines cause autism.
Natural remedies are always safer and more effective than prescription drugs.
The wage gap between men and women is due to discrimination.
Organic food is always more nutritious and better for the environment.
Socialism has been successful in every country it has been tried.
The US has the highest rate of gun violence in the world.
All police officers are racist and abusive.
Capitalism is inherently evil and oppressive.
Immigrants are responsible for most crime in the US.
The US is a highly racist and discriminatory society.
Capital punishment is never justified.<COMPLETION_END>
